name: Paracetamol
warnings: Do not exceed 4,000 mg in 24 hours
Consult a doctor if you have liver disease
Keep out of reach of children
description: Paracetamol (acetaminophen) is an analgesic and antipyretic used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.

name: Amoxicillin
warnings: Complete the full course as prescribed
Not recommended for patients with penicillin allergy
description: Amoxicillin is a penicillin-type antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.

name: Ibuprofen
warnings: Take with food to reduce stomach upset
Use cautiously in patients with kidney disease
description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for pain relief, fever reduction, and inflammation control.

name: Cetirizine
warnings: May cause drowsiness in some individuals
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist
description: Cetirizine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, and itchy/watery eyes.

name: Metformin
warnings: Take with meals to reduce gastrointestinal side effects
Not for use in severe kidney impairment
description: Metformin is an oral antidiabetic medication used to improve blood sugar control in adults with type 2 diabetes.

name: Aspirin
warnings: Do not use if allergic to aspirin
description: Aspirin is used to reduce pain, fever, and inflammation. Low doses are used to prevent heart attacks and strokes.

name: Azithromycin
warnings: Avoid if allergic to macrolide antibiotics
description: Azithromycin is a macrolide antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections including respiratory and skin infections.

name: Omeprazole
warnings: Long-term use may increase risk of bone fractures
description: Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor that reduces stomach acid production, used to treat GERD and ulcers.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Atorvastatin is a statin medication used to lower cholesterol and reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease.

name: Losartan
description: Losartan is an angiotensin receptor blocker used to treat high blood pressure and protect kidneys in diabetes.

name: Amlodipine
description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina).

name: Gabapentin
description: Gabapentin is used to treat nerve pain and prevent seizures. Also prescribed for restless leg syndrome.

name: Levothyroxine
description: Levothyroxine is a thyroid hormone replacement used to treat hypothyroidism (underactive thyroid).

name: Montelukast
description: Montelukast is a leukotriene receptor antagonist used to prevent asthma symptoms and treat allergic rhinitis.

name: Insulin
description: Insulin is a hormone injection used to control blood sugar levels in people with diabetes.

name: Pantoprazole
description: Pantoprazole is a proton pump inhibitor that reduces stomach acid, used to treat GERD and erosive esophagitis.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Clopidogrel is an antiplatelet medication used to prevent blood clots in people with heart disease or stroke history.
